1.0.0.name: wordpress/konvent
1.0.0.description:
The official plugin for interaction with the free swedish ticket service for events and conventions, konvent.se.

The plugin will add a widet that displays a list of upcoming events and their featured banners. These images not stored locally by the wordpress application.

More features will be included in future releases.

Shortcodes

If you dont like widgets you can use the shortcodes instead.

[konvent-eventlist] Lists 10 events.

[konvent-eventlist limit=999] Lists all the upcoming events.

[konvent-ticketTypes uri=testcon02] Lists the different tickets that can be bought.

Warning! Don't use different settings on shortcodes or widgets of the same type. Their settings are global and will interfere.
